name: Theresa Heiler Eyssen
text: Superior leather workmanship! Incredible inventory, head here to support small businesses as this one is worthy. The staff have integrity and imagination. They get a 5 star all the way.

name: Terry Higdon
text: Great place lots of great equipment friendly staff

name: Timothy Dalton
text: Great people who make great saddles. Also do repairs and upgrades on other saddles.

name: Dannielle Steele
text: Not a better tack store anywhere! Family atmosphere, fair prices, and great workmanship!!

name: Mary Ann Sellers
text: I love this place but fear they are suffering like other brick and mortar stores are. Great selection of saddles, head stalls and can custom most leather

name: venicia cook
text: I love this store beautiful saddles and tack with great prices.  And they have all kinds of stuff from hats and jewelry to home decor.

name: Cindy Burns
text: Super customer service! Lots of inventory.

name: Becky Gant Burns
text: Great people to work with. They are very helpful, good prices and have a great selection.

name: Bill Beane
text: Good fair and honest people that is a joy to buy any type farm feed equine equipment a very large selection of all. A family owned and operated store. So don't be surprised if a 12 year old young man loads your items into your vehicle. LoL  And don't  worry he knows his business like a grown man.

name: James White
text: Good people you get good quality products and great advice on all your farm needs. They have a great selection of birds you can order anything you want

name: Victoria Duncan
text: Absolutely love this place. By far the best place to get chickens!

name: Josh Gargis
text: Nicest people you will ever buy from.  Do business with local businesses.

name: Kathy Inman
text: Wonderful personal service. They are always very friendly.  The Hill's are great people!!

name: Rebecca Borden
text: I love this place and the people here are awesome. . Never rude always happy to help you with whatever issue you have.  Good people. .

name: Mary Terry
text: Love it. Well stocked and friendly, knowledgable people.

name: Kevin Johnson
text: Very good folks to do all your animals feed needs.& top notch service.

name: Jenn Tittle
text: If you need it KK and Tim have it and if they don't they will get it for you. Great prices amazing people and a small local business worth going to.

name: Gaylon Urban
text: Love going to vfar good folks

name: Nicole Hollingsworth
text: There's people are the best!

name: Pat J
text: Valley Tack had a mobile store at a Heart of Dixie Trail Ride in Troy, AL event. They offered excellent customer service and product selection for all those things that either broke or were forgotten at home.

name: Kayla Johnson
text: Great place to buy feed

name: Darwin Clark
text: Love this place!

name: Misty Posey
text: Good

name: Amber “Amber Rain” Mathewson
text:
I love Valley Head Saddlery and so does my teenage daughter!
My 6yr old son makes himself comfortable in preparation for a long stay when we go there!

name: Dannielle Steele
text: Great variety! Bar none customer service and quality! They treat you like family and stand behind what they sell! Absolutely LOVE this place and these people!!

name: Ian Pask
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable.  Will help you with anything!

name: kalub white
text: rude and unfriendly

name: Jenn V
text: We love running up to Carousel. They always have what we are looking for and are knowledgeable and helpful with fitting. We have purchased multiple pairs of riding boots, schooling and show clothes. It’s also a great place to find a gift for the horse lover in your life even if you do not know anything about horses yourself. They sell Breyer horses and other fun items for horses loving girls.

name: Faith Hill
text: Been there several times.  Place has been open since before I can remember in the 90s.  Nice little shop but packed.  There is another tack store in Pelham now.  The owner I have dealt with several times.  She is rude.  Been like that for a over a decade, but she has customers that have been shopping there for over a decade.  So while there might not be as much tact, she is very knowledgeable and is an actual horsewomen.

name: Leslie Thomas
text: Didn't go for me, rode along with a friend. Staff was super friendly and she was able to get everything she needed for her competition.

name: Renae Giles
text: I will shop here again and again.  The staff is wonderful, knowledgeable and very friendly.   They have wonderful and very affordable starter packages for beginning riders.  I just can't say enough great things about them.

name: Lillian Ellis
text: Very patient and caring. Will be buying all equestrian  needs here

name: Ashley Cromes
text: The worst customer service of my life. Rita is very rude and disrespectful. I will never shop here again. It's amazing how many I talk to who have had similar experiences. The shop is also overpriced. I would love to shop local anywhere except here.

name: John Johnson
text: Great little local shop with fun selection and great employees.

name: Libby Shackelford
text: I have been shopping at Carousel Tack Shop for 30 years.  The store is amazing.  When I have a horse training problem I call Rita. She has the equipment I need.  Nice shop.

name: Marie Jones
text: If I could give this shop zero stars I would.  Rita is so hateful and rude - she overcharges for items and has no integrity.   I will never set foot in that store again even if it means driving 3 hours to buy one thing.

name: ANNA LUNDEEN
text: Very clean and nice place. A little crowded but a great selection of tack and apparel!

name: Bill Tiemann
text: I brought my granddaughter, who is taking riding lessons, to do some shopping. The woman behind the counter was extremely rude. Eventually we left without making a purchase.

name: Tami Owings
text: The person working was so rude! We are new to the area and hoped to find a good tack shop instead of ordering, but this place will never get our business!!!

name: Molly McCown
text:
I have shopped here since I was a little girl. Carousel goes above and beyond to provide quality and affordable riding attire to all ages of riders! The staff is the most knowledgeable group of women who are capable of outfitting any equestrian from hunter/jumpers,
to eventers, and even saddle seat riders! This is the number one place I have always recommended to friends in the horse community!

name: Olivia Williams
text: Carousel is my all time favorite tack shop in Alabama! I never go anywhere else. EXCEPTIONAL customer service, time and attention. Rita, Molly, Martha, and Linda are always so helpful and friendly. If they do not have your size or color in stock of what you need, they will be happy to order it for you! I can't wait to go back. They make me want to pull up a chair and just hang out!

name: M Coco
text: Rita is so helpful and honest. Great selection.

name: James
text: Constant bad experiences and lack of professionalism has left us to no longer be customers. Like many others, we shopped due to a lack of available local options and tolerated behavior we should not have and no longer will. We have always heard about the owner Ritas lack of respect and courtesy and they have been proven true. The last visit crossed into the line of abuse which cannot be tolerated and should not happen to anyone. she needs to understand the impact that her rudeness has on her clients current and former. I hate that my family had to go through this experience.  Will not be giving another cent to this business.

name: Carolyn Layfield
text: The nicest woman you’ll ever meet. Huge selection.

name: Kristen Comer
text: We love Carousel Tack Shoppe! My daughter has been riding for 5 years, and Carousel is our go-to place. Rita, Linda, and Molly are always willing to go above and beyond to help. The shop's wonderful inventory has options and, on the odd time I can't find what I want, they are always so quick to get it for me. Beyond amazing customer service and wonderful inventory, they are so personable. Every time we come in they make a point of asking about us. We are so grateful for this fabulous shop!

name: Aimee Thompson
text: I love the Carousel Tack Shop!!!! Mrs Rita and her staff are always so helpful to me and my daughter. Mrs Rita goes out of her way to help me. If she doesn't have what I'm looking for she will order it. My daughter and I would not shop anywhere else. She has the best tack shop in Birmingham. The whole staff is very knowledgable about different types of riding and they help to educate me. I think they are awesome!!!! I would recommend the Carousel to anyone. We Love Mrs Rita!!!!!!!

name: Pretty View
text: Carousel is my go to tack shop when I need something for me or my horses. Rita is always so helpful. They have a good selection and at reasonable prices.

name: Stephanie Mayfield-Brooks
text: This local owned shop is a great resource for riders in our area.  We were looking for a nice used saddle and what we purchased from Carousel was in excellent condition.  Rita always goes out of the way to make sure that our needs are meet and is always willing to order anything that we need.

name: Elle Thompson
text: Mrs.Rita is always so helpful and is always helping me find the right things for me and my pony. And is always so nice to me when I walk in the store. She wants to make sure that I look good when I enter a show.

name: Rick Griffith
text: Wonderful selection of very fine equestrian gear and supplies.

name: FG Brooks
text: Rita is amazing I have been using Ms.Rita for 5 years now and i recommend Rita for beginners that want to learn to ride and become a professional rider like me.

name: Lunar Frantic
text:
The store was nothing but English tack. Nothing western related at all. Over priced stuf. The owner was very disrespectful. She used vulgar language, talking on the phone with someone, and didn't even close the door. Whether it's her shop or not, she showed my boyfriend and I that she was NOT business material.
The shop is too small, my boyfriend is tall, and stock, had a hard time getting around amongst the stuff the was practically thrown on the floors.

I'd never go back, especially since the shop is only focused in ONE thing. Dressage, racing, and English tack.

name: Cheryl Howard
text: I love Carousel Tack Shop!  Ms. Rita is the best and has everything my horse and I need and want!

name: Jennifer Tanner
text: I will never go back! The owner was very pushy. It was so bad that when I picked up the wrong size gloves she slapped my arm away from the display. She tried to sell me a pair of $40 gloves when I had asked for an inexpensive cotton pair. Her items are over priced, the shop is over crowded, and the owner is just rude. I will be looking for another place to spend my money.

name: GKM Equestrian
text: Love this place, great service and friendly staff.

name: Candous Langston
text: Excellent price for the beginning rider package!!!

name: Debbie Young
text: Great place, quality items, friendly staff!

name: Ramona Rhodes
text: Carousel Tack always has just what I need, and the owner rocks!❤️

name: Remy Helu
text: Local businesses must support

name: Kathi claybrook
text: Always a pleasure to shop there!

name: Diana McMurchy- Amato
text: Very friendly and a beautiful Facility

name: Connie McMullen
text: Peaceful and quiet with horses well cared for
